paper_abstract: This paper deals with the problem of robust fault detection for Markovian jump linear systems polytopic uncertainties using a generalized form of observer-based fault detection filler (FDF) as a residual generator, the design of robust FDF is formulated in the framework of stochastic H-infinity filtering Based on analyzing the robust mean. square stability and stochastic H-infinity performance of the FDF, sufficient conditions on the existence of both mode-independent H-infinity FDFs are respectively derived and solutions to the H-infinity FDFs are given in terms of linear matrix inequalities. A numerical example is given to show the effectiveness of the proposed method
paper_title: ON DESIGNING H-infinity FAULT DETECTION FILTER FOR MARKOVIAN JUMP LINEAR SYSTEMS WITH POLYTOPIC UNCERTAINTIES
